DOC.brief_summary: Quality of life of patients with a history of drug allergy in Thailand will be studied.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life of Patients With a History of Drug Allergy in Thailand
DOC.detailed_description: Thai patients with a history of drug allergy will be evaluated for their quality of life based on drug hypersensitivity quality of life questionnaire (DrHy-Q; Thai version) and The World Health Organization Quality of Life instrument (WHOQOL-BREF-THAI)
DOC.criteria: Have a history of drug allergy At least 18 years of age Not be able to understand Thai language
